data.meta_description: 20 août 2023 - The romance between Burt Reynolds and Loni Anderson wasn’t the longest one, but it was one of the biggest love-hate relationships ever. Their divorce lasted over three times longer than their marriage and they have gone from crazy in love to public insults to eventual peace.Before the divorce, Reynolds was one of Hollywood’s leading actors. His career faded over the next years and, in the end, the divorce has left him financially and emotionally drained. Here’s the full story.
